body:
> 0 bzed at hal:~$ apt-file search /usr/bin | wc -l
> 39033


I have to correct myself here - my apt-file lists some files more than
once...
0 bzed at hal:~$  apt-file search /usr/bin | sort -u | wc -l
20315


Still an impressive number.


Also while looking at the list, most packages which come with a lot of
programs use prefixes for their tools, bioperl uses bp_ for example (no,
I'm not suggesting to rename all radiance programs).




Cheers,


Bernd




Bernd Zeimetz
<bernd at bzed.de>                         <http://bzed.de/>
___
